data.head: https://akmweb.youngjoygame.com/web/svnres/img/mlbb/homepage/100_da424b020b8ac8235d64a1b8a09aa749.png

skilllist.skilldesc: Upon retrieving the <font color="a6aafb">Seimei Umbrella</font>, Kagura gains a 280<font color="62f8fe"> (+50% Total Magic Power)</font> shield, stuns nearby enemies for 0.5s, and slows them by 60% for 1s. Cooldown: 4.5s.

Kagura sends the <font color="a6aafb">Seimei Umbrella</font> to the target location, dealing 315<font color="62f8fe"> (+105% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> to enemies in its path and slowing them by 60% for 0.5s. The Umbrella will automatically return to Kagura when she's too far away.
This skill deals 130% damage to non-hero enemies.
Kagura removes all debuffs on her and leaps in the target direction, while leaving the <font color="a6aafb">Seimei Umbrella</font> behind.

Kagura invokes the power of the <font color="a6aafb">Seimei Umbrella</font>, dealing 330<font color="62f8fe"> (+105% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> to nearby enemies, knocking them back, and slowing them by 60% for 0.5s.

Upon retrieving the <font color="a6aafb">Seimei Umbrella</font>, Kagura gains a 280<font color="62f8fe"> (+50% Total Magic Power)</font> shield, stuns nearby enemies for 0.5s, and slows them by 60% for 1s. Cooldown: 4.5s.

Kagura sends the <font color="a6aafb">Seimei Umbrella</font> to the target location, dealing 315<font color="62f8fe"> (+105% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> to enemies in its path and slowing them by 60% for 0.5s. The Umbrella will automatically return to Kagura when she's too far away.
This skill deals 130% damage to non-hero enemies.

Kagura teleports to the <font color="a6aafb">Seimei Umbrella</font>'s location and retrieves it, dealing 300<font color="62f8fe"> (+90% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> to the nearby enemies.

Kagura invokes the power of the <font color="a6aafb">Seimei Umbrella</font>, resetting the cooldown of <font color="a6aafb">Seimei Umbrella Open</font>, dealing 290<font color="62f8fe"> (+70% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> to enemies around the Umbrella, and slowing them by 60%. After 1.5s, enemy heroes around the Umbrella will be pulled toward it and dealt 550<font color="62f8fe"> (+170% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font>.

data.name: Kagura

__data.skilldesc:
Deal 100 (+10*Hero Level) plus 13% of the target's lost HP as <font color="ffe63c">True Damage</font> to the target enemy hero.
This damage <font color="62f8fe">ignores shields</font>. If the target is slain by this skill, the cooldown will be reduced by 40%.
__data.skilldesc_text: Deal <Num1> plus <%Num2> of the target's lost HP as [C5True Damage] to the target enemy hero.####This damage [C2ignores shields]. If the target is slain by this skill, the cooldown will be reduced by <%Num3>.
__data.skilldescemblem:
Deal 100 (+10*Hero Level) plus 13% of the target's lost HP as <font color="ffe63c">True Damage</font> to the target enemy hero.
This damage <font color="62f8fe">ignores shields</font>. If the target is slain by this skill, the cooldown will be reduced by 40%.

recommendmasterplan.description: Mid Lane: Burst damage-focused to eliminate enemies with a full combo.

emblemattr.emblemattr:
+14 Adaptive Penetration
+10 Adaptive Attack
+3% Movement Speed

emblemskill.skilldesc:
Gain 5 <font color="ffdfa2">Adaptive Penetration</font>.

<font color="8098ab">Gain Physical Penetration if extra Physical Attack is higher than extra Magic Power; otherwise, gain Magic Penetration.</font>
emblemskill.skilldesc_text: Gain <Num1> [ffdfa2]Adaptive Penetration[-].########[8098ab]Gain Physical Penetration if extra Physical Attack is higher than extra Magic Power; otherwise, gain Magic Penetration.[-]
emblemskill.skilldescemblem:
Gain 5 <font color="ffdfa2">Adaptive Penetration</font>.

<font color="8098ab">Gain Physical Penetration if extra Physical Attack is higher than extra Magic Power; otherwise, gain Magic Penetration.</font>

emblemskill.skilldesc: Equipment can be purchased at 95% of their base price.
emblemskill.skilldesc_text: Equipment can be purchased at <%Num1> of their base price.
emblemskill.skilldescemblem: Equipment can be purchased at 95% of their base price.

emblemskill.skilldesc:
Dealing damage greater than 7% of an enemy hero's Max HP 3 times within 5s will scorch the target for an additional 162-750 <font color="ffdfa2">Adaptive Damage</font> (scales with level).

<font color="8098ab">Cooldown: 15s</font>.
emblemskill.skilldesc_text: Dealing damage greater than <%Num3> of an enemy hero's Max HP <Num2> times within <Num1>s will scorch the target for an additional <Num5> [ffdfa2]Adaptive Damage[-] (scales with level).########[8098ab]Cooldown: <Num6>s[-].
emblemskill.skilldescemblem:
Dealing damage greater than 7% of an enemy hero's Max HP 3 times within 5s will scorch the target for an additional 162-750 <font color="ffdfa2">Adaptive Damage</font> (scales with level).

<font color="8098ab">Cooldown: 15s</font>.

equiplist.equipskill1: Resonate: Every 6s, the next skill echoes, dealing <font color="62f8fe"> (+1.2 Total Magic Power)</font> extra Magic Damage to up to 3 enemies, speeding up the hero by 30%, which decays over 2s.
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Resonate: Every 6s, the next skill echoes, dealing <font color="62f8fe"> (+1.2 Total Magic Power)</font> extra Magic Damage to up to 3 enemies, speeding up the hero by 30%, which decays over 2s.

equiplist.equipskill1: Magic: Dealing Magic Damage to enemy heroes will reduce their Magic Defense by 3(+0.3*Hero Level) for 2s. Stacks up to 3 times.
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Magic: Dealing Magic Damage to enemy heroes will reduce their Magic Defense by 3(+0.3*Hero Level) for 2s. Stacks up to 3 times.

equiplist.equipskill1: Mystery: Gains 21%-35% extra Magic Power (scales with level).
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Mystery: Gains 21%-35% extra Magic Power (scales with level).

equiplist.equipskill1: Spellbreaker: When attacking an enemy, gains 0.1% extra Magic Penetration for each point of the enemy's Magic Defense, capped at 20%.
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Spellbreaker: When attacking an enemy, gains 0.1% extra Magic Penetration for each point of the enemy's Magic Defense, capped at 20%.

equiplist.equipskill1: Frozen: Upon use, becomes frozen but immune to all damage and effects.
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Frozen: Upon use, becomes frozen but immune to all damage and effects.
equiplist.equiptips:
+45 Adaptive Attack
+400 Extra Max HP
+5% Cooldown Reduction

recommendmasterplan.name: AI.Lina
recommendmasterplan.title: Pro Player

data.story: A genius Onmyouji Master that inherited the ancestral treasure Seimei Umbrella.

assist.desc: Kagura works well with tank heroes with strong CC skills that allow her to deal more damage with her Ultimate, such as Atlas and Tigreal.

strong.desc: Kagura's Ultimate can deal high burst damage, making her strong against back-row heroes with no dash or blink, such as Layla and Eudora.

weak.desc: Kagura is countered by heroes with more than one control immunity abilities that allow them to escape her various CC skills, heroes like Joy and Martis are good examples.
